item.title: Yen Carry Traders Cheer on Ueda's Softly-Softly Approach to BOJ
item.description: Haruhiko Kuroda’s reappointment as Bank of Japan Governor has been welcomed by yen carry traders, who believe that his dovish stance will continue to support the Japanese currency. Kuroda has pledged to keep interest rates low and continue with the BOJ’s quantitative easing program, which has helped to weaken the yen and make it a more attractive funding currency for carry trades.
